remarks: Implicit substitution inference for ordered pairs.  Compare ~ copsex2g .  (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
copsex2ga.1 $e |- ( A = <. x , y >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
copsex2ga $p |- ( A e. ( V X. W ) -> ( ph <-> E. x E. y ( A = <. x , y >. /\ ps ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ph x y $.
